    j = java.ajax(su + url);
    reg = /function ajax[\s\S]+?\}(?=Ajax)/;
    eval(String(j.match(reg)[0]))
    java.ajax(su + ajax(c2))
    result = java.ajax(baseUrl)
}

while (/请输入验证码：/.test(result)) {
	img = `${su}/member/getcode.asp,{"headers":{"Referer":"${baseUrl}"}}`;

	img = java.downloadFile(img)
	code=java.getVerificationCode(java.getFile(img))

//	code=java.getVerificationCode(img)
	aa=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
	aa.select("[placeholder=请输入验证码]").attr("value",code)
	body=Array.from(aa.select("form[name=frmss] input"),x=>x.attr("name")+"="+x.attr("value")).join("&")
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{
  "body": "${body}",
  "charset": "GBK",
  "headers": {
"Referer": "${baseUrl}"
  },
  "method": "POST"
}`)
}

result

url += "sscc/"
body = `act=${act}&q=${java.encodeURI(key, 'gbk')}&submit=${submit}`

re=java.post(url,body,{})
ck=re.header("Set-Cookie")
cookie.replaceCookie(url,ck)
rr=re.header("Location")
reurl=url+rr

<js>doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
$ = (a) => doc.select(a)
if (/function S2H/.test(result)) {
	function S2H(s){
        var r = [];
        for(var i=0;i<s.length/2;i++){
            r[r.length]= parseInt(s.substr(i*2,2), 16);
        }
        return r;
    }
    var str = S2H(String($('str').html()).replace(/\s/ig,''));
    var key = S2H(String(cookie.getKey(source.getKey(),'key')));
    var x = 0, ret = "";
    for(var i=0;i<str.length;i++){
        var d = (str[i] + key[x]);
        if(d>255)d=d%255;
        ret+='%'+('0'+d.toString(16)).substr(-2,2);
        x++; if(x>=key.length) x=0;
    }
    var html = decodeURIComponent(decodeURI(ret));
    $('str').html(html);
}
doc</js>

<js>
var 电话号码=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("电话号码")||result.get("电话号码")

var 验证码=source.getLoginInfoMap().get( "验证码")

var time = Math.round(new Date()/1000);
lll=[
"appId=",
"osType=2",
"product=1",
"sysVer=10",
"time="+time,
"token=",
"ver=2.1.7",
"packageName=com.lestory.jihua.an",
"lang-app=zh-Hans",
"lang=zh-hans",
"locale=CN"
]
function toJson(list){
    json = "";
    for (i in list)
    {
        all = list[i].match(/(.*?)=(.*)/);
        key = all[1];
        value = all[2];
        json += '"' + key + '":' + '"' + value + '",'
    }
    json = '{' + String(json).replace(/,$/,'')+ '}'
    return json;
}

function sign(list){
var sb='';
sb+="Fb0gqLMSf5Android";
list=list.sort();
i=0;
while(i<list.length){
if(i==0){
sb+=list[i]
}else{
    if(list[i].match(/lang-app=/)){  
      i2=i+1;
     i3=i2+1;
     if (list[i2] != null && list[i2].match(/lang=/)) {
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i2];
                        
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i];
                        
                        i = i3;
                    }
           }
                sb+="&";
                sb+=list[i];             
      }
i++
}
sb+="AEdDtho2CjiH901aVK7swFqclu6NmzJ4";
return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase()
}

num=电话号码;
function getVerificationCode(){
	//获取验证码
 list2=lll;
list2.push( "mobile=86"+num);
s=sign(list2);
list2.push("sign="+s);
json2=toJson(list2);
option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(json2)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/message/send,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
java.toast(JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).msg=="success"?"验证码发送成功，请注意短信":"验证码获取失败，请稍候再试");

	}


function login(){
	//登录
	
	y=验证码
	list2=lll;
list2.push("mobile=86"+num);
list2.push("code="+y);
s=sign(list2);
list2.push("sign="+s);
json2=toJson(list2)

option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(json2)
}

url='http://api.lestory.cn/user/mobile-login,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
a=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));
source.putLoginHeader(a.data.user_token=="undefined"?"":a.data.user_token)

java.toast(a.msg=="success"?'获取token成功':JSON.stringify(a));

}

</js>
